lead_paragraph: RODBELL--Arthur, passed away at 91, in New York City on April 23, 2016 after a brief illness. Loving husband to Rhoda, whom he was married to for 66 years. Beloved father to sons, Gary and Mitchell, their wives, Colette and Liz, and grandchildren, Samantha, Julia, Hannah and Sarah. Arthur is predeceased by siblings Wilfred, Sheldon, and Lucille. He was highly regarded for his business acumen in the apparel industry and was President and Founder of Parade Dress Company for 40 years. He was an Air Force Sergeant in WWII and POW. A Great American and supporter of Israel. He will be terribly missed by family and friends. Services will be on Monday, April 25th at 12:45pm at "The Riverside", Amsterdam Ave at 76st. Donations may be sent to UJA Federation of New York. 1/3
